title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-6.2 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-6.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations
(a) Delivery prohibition. No
person may deliver or cause the delivery of petroleum to any tank system whose
fill port has a tag attached. No person may accept petroleum to any tank system
whose fill port has a tag attached. (b) Tag tampering and removal
prohibition. Unless authorized by the Department, no person may tamper
with or remove a tag attached to a fill port, or cause such tampering or
removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
